eurecom.tigerreader

Class TIGERReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtensionModule
      • eurecom.tigerreader.TIGERReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable

    public class TIGERReader
extends ExtensionModule
    This class is used to parse and read geographic data in TIGER format
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Jerome Haerri

      • act

        public int act()
        Executes the extension.

        The method is called on every simulation timestep.
        Specified by:
        act in class ExtensionModule
        Returns:
        0 - the module should be executed on next timesteps, -1 - the module should not be executed on further timesteps and should be removed from the extensions' list

      • getNextField

        protected java.lang.String getNextField(int size)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the next field of currently read record.

        Gets next field of currently read record. Set size to -1 to get the rest of current line
        Parameters:
        size - size of the field (in symbols)
        Returns:
        field value or null if eof reached
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getInternalPoints

        protected boolean getInternalPoints(java.util.ArrayList intPoints,
                                    java.lang.String roadID,
                                    int sequenceNumber)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Extracts internal points (also called Shape Points in TIGER nomoclature) given the road ID and the sequence number
        Parameters:
        intPoints - List originally empty containing the shape points
        roadID - Road ID for which the shape points will be extracted
        sequenceNumber - Sequence number related the the road and the shape points in case more than a line of TIGER is needed
        Returns:
        1 - the method ended on a new line for a different roadID. So we shall not remove it in the mother method (as not yet processed, since for an other road) 0 - the method ended normally on the line we processed. So the mother method will be allowed to remove this line (as fully processed)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadClippingArea

        public void loadClippingArea()
        Loads the clipping area from the central point and the size of the rectangular area. It overrides the clipping area from SpatialModel

      • load

        public void load(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the object from XML tag.

        Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org) (20/01/2006):
             Changed the path style to a GDF file from a file system's style to URL style (similar to absolute system-dependant address but with the prefix      "file://" )
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
